task.title: Adding a Chart of Accounts
task.abstract: A chart of accounts consists of GL accounts. Assign GL accounts to items so journal entries can be automatically created in the system for various transactions. The Chart of Accounts is often set up during the initial implementation, but organizations can create new GL accounts as business needs arise. Look at org system and match all GL accounts to current accounting software.

step.cmd: Click the New GL Account button within the Chart of Accounts related list on the Business Group record.
Enter the GL account name in the Description field. Click Save.
Enter any optional field values as needed. Click Save.

taskbody.result: The required GL accounts are created and viewable in the Chart of Accounts related list present on the Business Group record.
